A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
My (spoiler free) thoughts on Star Wars: The Last Jedi -----

There are things that do and do not occur in this film that seem very illogical in connection to the story (with no logical explanation either). In terms of pacing\, there are some REALLY cheesy\, unnecessary parts...  But also some really cool scenes that seem out of place for when they occur. 

All in all\, it's a cool action / sci-fi movie\, but a disappointing "Star Wars" movie in terms of the story and feeling connected to the plot and characters. The point of a sequel is to connect the dots\, not add more and space them further apart. Now episode 9 will have to cram in A LOT of added things that Rian chose to neglect. 

6.5/10
